OrgName.entry: HEELEY CITY FARM IRON AGE ROUNDHOUSE PROJECT

AltName.entry: DIGGING OUR ROOTS FARMING HERITAGE PROJECT (FORMER NAME)

Desc.entry: A registered charity which is currently building an Iron Age round house on the Heeley City Farm site which will be used as a classroom when it is finished. Aims to build an iron smelting furnace in the future. Runs heritage farming activities including traditional craft-making during the year and at Heeley Festival.
